title: Syndro and The Worms by Max Baker
description: Syndro and The Worms by Max Baker. Read by Chris Pavlo from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and under category.
